functions.name: listCalendarEvents
functions.description: Retrieve events from the user's Google Calendar.

functions.name: getCalendarEventDetails
functions.description: Get details of a specific Google Calendar event.

functions.name: createCalendarEvent
functions.description: Create a new event in the user's Google Calendar.

functions.name: updateCalendarEvent
functions.description: Update an existing event in the user's Google Calendar.

functions.name: deleteCalendarEvent
functions.description: Delete an event from the user's Google Calendar.
